message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, and we can negotiate from there.
You wanted 50/50, I'll give you 40/60, take it or leave it.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more due to the inflation. This is my revised offer.
You're still trying to get more, I'll give you the same as my original offer, but I'll throw in a slight increase to my share. Take it or leave it.
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'm still hoping to get a better deal. I'm willing to give you less, but I think I deserve a bit more.
You're getting desperate, I'm getting firm. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
